column4: I was planning to install both Ubuntu and Kubuntu to see which version I perfer but from what I heard, te application menu would get cluttred with applications from both versions no matter what session you use. Is there a way to prevent this from happening? LIke only show GNOMe apps under Gnome and Kubuntu apps under Kubuntu?
i dont find it a problem. I always install ubuntu and kubuntu, and xubuntu. :)
another machine may allready have the ip.
I'm the only one on the network right now and also my static IP isn't in the normal networks DHCP list.
